SubRuleDesc: If 99381 (Initial comprehensive preventive medicine evaluation and management of an individual including an age and gender appropriate history, examination, counseling/anticipatory guidance/risk factor reduction interventions, and the ordering of laboratory/diagnostic procedures, new patient; infant (age younger than 1 year)) or 99391 (Periodic comprehensive preventive medicine reevaluation and management of an individual including an age and gender appropriate history, examination, counseling/anticipatory guidance/risk factor reduction interventions, and the ordering of laboratory/diagnostic procedures, established patient; infant (age younger than 1 year)) is billed and the patient's age is greater than or equal to 10 months, then deny 99381 and 99391 with reason Exceeds Clinical Guidelines. Exceptions: 1) Modifiers: HA or TJ. 2) Place Of Service: 50 (Federally Qualified Facility), 71 (State Or Local Public Health Clinic) and 72 (Rural Health Clinic).
